title: Sid Meier's Civilization V: Complete FiNAL - DiGiTALZONE
description:
Sid Meier's Civilization V: Complete FiNAL [DiGiTALZONE]

With over nine million units sold worldwide, and unprecedented critical acclaim from fans and press around the world, Sid Meier's Civilization is recognized as one of the greatest strategy franchises of all-time. Now, Firaxis Games will take this incredibly fun and addictive strategy game to unprecedented heights by adding new ways to play and win; new tools to manage and expand your civilization; extensive modding capabilities; and intensely competitive multiplayer options. Civilization V will come to life in a beautifully detailed, living world that will elevate the gameplay experience to a whole new level making it a must-have for gamers around the globe! 

You can change your nick and language by using Configuration.exe in game folder.

DLC Included:

- Sid Meier's Civilization V: Brave New World
- Sid Meier's Civilization V: Gods and Kings
- Conquest of the New World Deluxe
- Wonders of the Ancient World
- Explorer's Map Pack
- Scrambled Continents Map Pack
- Scrambled Nations Map Pack
- Genghis Khan's Mongolia
- Harald Bluetooth's Denmark
- Isabella's Spain and Pachacuti's Incan Empire
- Kamehameha's Polynesian Empire
- Nebuchadnezzar's Babylon
- Sejong The Great's Korea
- Cradle of Civilization: Americas
- Cradle of Civilization: Asia
- Cradle of Civilization: Mediterranean
- Cradle of Civilization: Mesopotamia

Features:

- Release 17.08.2018
- Original content with latest updates
- Intro movies removed
- MP3 extra soundtrack removed
- Removed unnecessary clutter left by developer
- Clean install with no unneeded files
- Ready for LAN play

Available languages:
- English *
- French *
- German *
- Italian *
- Spanish *
- Polish *
- Japanese
- Korean
- Russian *
- Chinese (Traditional)

(*) Spoken language support

Technical:

- Game build version: 1.0.3.279

Thanks to:

* ALI213 & Steam006 & machine4578
* cs.rin.ru


DiGITALZONE
